course_description: Introduction to game theory and strategic thinking. Foundational building blocks of non-cooperative games including normal and strategic form games, Nash equilibrium concept, various equilibrium concept refinements including backwards induction, sub-game perfection, and perfect Bayesian equilibrium.
sections: Class Nbr: 2124, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: A. Stashko, Status: Open
